column4: what does this give you?  apt-cache policy ooobasis3.0-onlineupdate
did you manually install this package?  ooobasis3.0-onlineupdate
no, this package is not in /var/cache/apt/archives
hmm, this package is not available on the ubuntu repos .. so, i'm guessing it was installed manually
what happens when you try and remove this package?
try this.  sudo aptitude purge ooobasis3.0-onlineupdate
Uplink, Derander: I think I got a tough problem :)
indeed.  try this.  sudo dpkg -r --force-all ooobasis3.0-onlineupdate
Yes, thats why I am thanking you :)
you should run this now.  sudo apt-get install -f
Yes, thats the first thing I did
